title: His obsessive online posts terrorized her. But were they illegal threats?
description: The Supreme Court hears a key free-speech case this month involving singer Coles Whalen, whose stalker was sent to prison.

title: Lemon8 is a Chinese app. Can it survive the hype cycle?
description: The app is owned by TikTok's parent company ByteDance, but many content creators seem fatigued by the prospect of yet another platform to post on.

title: Student or AI bot? New ChatGPT writing detectors can get it wrong.
description: Five high school students helped our tech columnist test a ChatGPT-writing detector coming to 2.1 million teachers from Turnitin. It missed enough to get someone in trouble.
